messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom]  Unschooling and Discussion ( was To Leonie
messages.messageBody:
<What I found encouraging about Helen's discussion with her son is that it reminded me of discussions we have here, >

Bob, I understand your points, I think :-), about rap and culture. I was suggesting that we can discuss choices with our kids - and sometimes they still make choices different to ours! I think the discussions you mentioned above, with your kids, are a big part of unschooling, at least here at our house - conversational learning. Yes, this discussion happens with other forms of schooling but not in such quantities as in unschooling ...You said, in another post, that you're not ready to unschool - but these discussions with your kids can let you see what unschooling may be like for you...Leonie W.


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
